mapper.insert: insert all into radiantInfo(clnum, clname, category, price, salerate) values(${seq}.nextval, '${stockDTO.getClName()}', '${stockDTO.getCategory()}', ${stockDTO.getPrice()}, ${stockDTO.getSalerate()}) into radiantStock(clnum, color, entercount, outcount) values(${seq}.currval, '${stockDTO.getColor()}', ${stockDTO.getEnterCount()}, 0) into radiantDetail(clnum, cldetail, likecount) values(${seq}.currval, '${stockDTO.getClDetail()}', 0) select * from dual
mapper.select: select clnum, clname, category, price, salerate, color, entercount, outcount, clDetail from radiantinfo join radiantstock using(clnum) join radiantdetail using(clnum) order by clnum, color
mapper.update: update radiantInfo set clname=#{clName}, category=#{category}, price=#{price}, salerate=#{salerate} where clnum=#{clNum}
update radiantStock set color=#{color}, entercount=#{enterCount}, outcount=#{outCount} where clnum=#{clNum}
update radiantdetail set cldetail=#{clDetail} where clnum=#{clNum}
